threats.title: BA01 Malicious Insider In Cloud Infrastructure (from flow 2)
threats.description: Malicious insider in cloud infrastructure causes security issues of cloud application (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA02 Lack Of Reserved Resources For Cloud Application (from flow 2)
threats.description: Lack of reserved resources for cloud application because of overload of cloud infrastructure (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA03 Failure Of Resource Scaling For Cloud Application (from flow 2)
threats.description: Unexpected failure of resource scaling for cloud application (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA04 Hidden Dependencies Of Cloud Infrastructure (from flow 2)
threats.description: Hidden dependencies between components of cloud application and cloud infrastructure cause security issues of cloud application (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA05 Lack Of Resource Isolation Of Cloud Application (from flow 2)
threats.description: Lack of data, code, network isolation of cloud applications caused by misconfigurations and vulnerabilities of cloud infrastructure (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA06 Loss Of Security Control (from flow 2)
threats.description: Loss of visibility and control of security and privacy of cloud application (partially controlled) (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA07 Poor Information Security Processes (from flow 2)
threats.description: Poor information security processes of cloud provider (design, implementation and operations) (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA08 Audit And Certification Issues (from flow 2)
threats.description: Audit and certification of cloud applications and infrastructure are inaccessible or restricted (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA09 Security Issues Of SLA (from flow 2)
threats.description: Incorrect or unclear information security section of SLA (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA10 Service Provider Lock-In (from flow 2)
threats.description: Service provider lock-in (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA11 Software License Issues (from flow 2)
threats.description: Software license issues (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA12 Confiscation Of Computer Hardware (from flow 2)
threats.description: Confiscation of computer hardware of cloud provider as a result of subpoena by law-enforcement agencies (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA13 Restrictions Of Forensic Readiness (from flow 2)
threats.description: Restrictions of forensic readiness for cloud applications (e.g. access to low-level logs and background data, disclosure of client context) (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA14 Physical Access Or Theft Of Computer Equipment (from flow 2)
threats.description: Unauthorized access or theft of computer equipment from data centre (because of flow 2)

threats.title: BA15 Destruction Of Data Center (from flow 2)
threats.description: Natural disasters destroy data centre or cloud infrastructure (Force Majeure) (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic DoS threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic DoS threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic elevation threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic elevation threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic information disclosure threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic information disclosure threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic repudiation threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic spoofing threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic spoofing threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic tampering threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic tampering threat (because of flow 2)
